title: The tricyclic alkaloid catalyzed crystallization of α-FAPbI3 for high performance antisolvent-free perovskite solar cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,4670-4680
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01008F, Paper
Zhengzhe Wu, Haoyu Cai, Tong Wu, Jiayi Xu, Zhenyue Wang, Hongqiang Du, Juan Zhao, Fuzhi Huang, Yi-Bing Cheng, Jie Zhong
The tricyclic alkaloid colchicine is applied to catalyzed crystallization (CC) of high-quality α-FAPbI3 perovskite film in the one-step antisolvent-free process for high performance perovskite solar cells.
